titleStmt.title: An Act touching the moneys and coyns of England.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Husband and John Field, Printers to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: Order to print dated: Die Martis, 17 Julii, 1649. Signed: Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
